snippet: Larry Miller has resigned as the president of the Portland Trail Blazers. The team said that Miller, who had two years left on his contract, was taking a position with another Portland-area business.
lead_paragraph: Larry Miller has resigned as the president of the Portland Trail Blazers. The team said that Miller, who had two years left on his contract, was taking a position with another Portland-area business.

headline.seo: Portland Trail Blazers President Larry Miller Resigns
